plugin.name: Multiple_Send
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.description:
You can send a command to one or more worlds, or all worlds, like this:
#all say Goodnight All <-- sends to all open worlds #1 say Hi everyone <-- sends to world #1 #123 say Follow Me <-- sends to worlds #1, #2 and #3
Multiple_Send:help <-- this help screen

muclient.script:
' ' based on a script by Shadowfyr (with minor corrections) '
sub SendToWlds(name, output, wildcards) dim z, wrld
select case wildcards(1) case "all" for each wrld in world.getworldIDlist set sndworld = world.getworldbyid(wrld) sndworld.send wildcards(2) next case else if isnumeric(wildcards(1)) then count = 1 for each wrld in world.getworldIDlist if instr (wildcards (1), cstr (count)) and count < 10 then set sndworld = world.getworldbyid(wrld) sndworld.send wildcards(2) end if count = count + 1 next else world.note "Error! Unable to determine world to send to." end if end select end sub
Sub OnHelp (sName, sLine, wildcards) World.Note World.GetPluginInfo (World.GetPluginID, 3) End Sub
